description: I'm an experienced Engineering Manager and Software Engineer with a demonstrated history in the Information Technology and Services industry. I specialize in leading diverse technical teams to deliver high-quality software solutions while fostering a culture of continuous improvement..
detailOrQuote: Passionate about software engineering, I'm driven by problem-solving and innovation. Leveraging my management and technical expertise, I'm dedicated to creating efficient software solutions that are not only high-performing but also accessible and user-friendly.
